etymology.description: Depicts grass or herb plants growing
etymology.interpretation: The character 䒑(䒑) (cǎo, "grass") visually represents grass or similar herbaceous plants, emphasizing the natural form of grass sprouting from the ground.

examples.chinese: 田野里长满了䒑(田野裡長滿了䒑)。
examples.pinyin: Tiányě lǐ zhǎng mǎn le cǎo。
examples.english: The fields are full of grass.

examples.chinese: 清风拂过䒑(清風拂過䒑)，带来了春天(帶來了春天)。
examples.pinyin: Qīngfēng fúguò cǎo, dài lái le chūntiān。
examples.english: The gentle breeze brushed the grass, bringing spring.
